title: Micro-Entrepreneur Service and Work Portal
description:
This is our team's submission for Angelhack 2019.

We developed a blockchain Micro-Entrepreneur Service and Work Portal (MeSaw) that serves as the financial inclusive initiative for micro-entrepreneurs. It represents our efforts to experiment with the centrality blockchain.

This project won us the AngelHack Centrality Challenge.

Certificate of achievement

Link to our video presentation on youtube
